translated: Zoiseau Lady Name (s) joint (s) Paradise Flycatcher Mascarene Terpsiphone Bourbon, Bird Lady, Zoiseau the Virgin Zoiso the Virgin Flycatcher Paradise, Chakouat Scientific name Terpsiphone bourbonnensis Classification Passereau of the Monarchidae endemic Distribution La Ré.
